title: "Herophilus Publishes General Method for Detecting Relevant Signals in Machine Learning Analysis of Complex Biological Datasets"
excerpt: "Herophilus, a leading biotechnology company developing neurotherapeutics to cure complex brain diseases, today announced the publication of research that describes a new statistical method to identify and analyze the effects of potentially confounding variables on machine learning models for complex biological datasets."
